entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , L'Anse-au-Loup
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:58 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -5.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 11:00 PM AST Tuesday 24 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -5.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 78 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -8.5°C
Wind: W 23 km/h gust 35 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 14 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Clear. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 23 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Tuesday 24 January 2023
